presentationColumns.name: Current Onhand Quantity
presentationColumns.description: Shows current inventory quantity in primary unit of measure.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV - Inventory Balances.Current Onhand Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Receiving Quantity
presentationColumns.description: Shows the quantity received in the receiving Inventory organization but not putaway to the storage location.

presentationColumns.name: Inbound Quantity
presentationColumns.description: Shows Inbound quantities which includes Approved Purchase Orders, Advance Shipment Notice, Intransit shipment via Transfer Order, Intransit shipment via Interorganization Transfers, Internal Requisitions.

presentationColumns.name: In-Transit Quantity
presentationColumns.description: Shows In-transit quantities which includes In-transit shipment via Transfer Orders and In-transit shipment via Inter-organization Transfers.

presentationColumns.name: Consigned Quantity
presentationColumns.description: Shows Consigned Inventory quantity which are received against consigned purchase orders or transfered to consigned explicitly.

presentationColumns.name: Current Secondary Onhand Quantity
presentationColumns.description: Shows current inventory quantity in secondary unit of measure.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV - Inventory Balances.Current Secondary Onhand Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Secondary Receiving Quantity
presentationColumns.description: Shows the quantity received in secondary unit of measure in the receiving Inventory organization but not putaway to the storage location.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV - Inventory Balances.Secondary Receiving Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Secondary Consigned Quantity
presentationColumns.description: Shows Consigned Inventory quantity in secondary unit of measure which are received against consigned purchase orders or transfered to consigned explicitly.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV - Inventory Balances.Secondary Consigned Quantity
